title: Elly Schlein - Wikipedia
snippet: In May 2015, Schlein announced through a post on Facebook that she was leaving the PD, being in deep disagreement with the new political line of the party imposed by the party secretary and Italy's prime minister Matteo Renzi, and joined Possible, the party founded by Civati.

title: Elly Schlein – POLITICO
snippet: Schlein, secretary of the center-left Democratic Party, has railed against the prime minister for her politics. ... Fading Italian firebrand pins his election chances on a 3km crossing that’s been mooted since Roman times.

title: Biography - Elly Schlein
snippet: She is later elected to the party’s national Assembly and national Board. Elly Schlein is a candidate in the European elections: this is a new challenge, an uphill path which, she knows, needs to involve and engage citizens through collective mobilization, taking it step by step.

title: Why Elly Schlein is freaking out Italy’s ‘soft’ socialists
snippet: Right-wing hardliners could not dream of an easier target than Elly Schlein, the new leader of Italy’s center-left Democratic Party (PD).

title: 4 Things to Know About Elly Schlein, Face of Italy's Largest Opposition Party | ITALY Magazine
snippet: On March 12, 37-year-old Elly Schlein will officially take the helm of Italy's struggling Partito Democratico (Democratic Party or PD). Here's a rundown of her biography and basic stats.
